EmailTemplate.name: Co-Branding Request Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Your recent Co-Branded Collateral submission cannot be completed at this time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Co_Branding_Request__c.OwnerFullName},
Your request for Co-Branded Collateral cannot be completed at this time.
Either one or both of the following conditions are the reason(s) for the rejection:
1. NCR will not be able to complete your project in your designated timeframe OR 2. Your submission does not meet minimum branding requirements detailed within NCR Branding guidelines or due to a large backlog of work
If you have any questions, please contact Partner Network Resource Center at partner.resourcecenter@ncr.com
Sincerely,
NCR Partner Network
NCR Confidential. For internal use by NCR and its authorized Solution Providers and Distributors only. NCR Corporation 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308-1007 Â©2019 NCR Corporation. All rights reserved. ncr.com NCR respects your privacy.
